content:
The HL7 ballot is now closed.
Here's how FHIR Shorthand did on the proposed on STU 1 publication:

  • 68 Affirmative (49 needed for approval)
  • 13 Negative (10 from Philips, 1 from MITRE, 2 from Audacious)
  • 59 Abstentions
  • 46 No-votes
  • 7 voters submitted spreadsheets with comments.

The last figure is the most significant, in my view, because it represents people who took the time to read and comment on the specification. I'll crack the comments open later today and see what's in store for us in terms of ballot reconciliation.
